chapters.title: Chapter 11: A Hell in Maderin
chapters.info: Aurana Paendrag, p. 285—Daughter of Radhanan and sister of Tuon, among the family of the Empress of Seanchan. She is 14 years old (eight by Seanchan custom). According to Semirhage, Aurana is dead along with the rest of Tuon's relatives. See also Empress (of Seanchan), The; Paendrag, Aurana; Paendrag, Radhanan; Paendrag, Ravashi; Paendrag, Tuon Athaem Kore.
